name: Get All The Carrots
description:
Game developed for the 20s gamejam of 2022.

Race to the end of the level under 20 seconds and try to get as many of the carrots as possible. 

A/D to move and space to jump or use your controller.

You can try the standard run which features the same level, or you can try the random run mode in which levels will be composed from different pre-prepared sections allowing for 60 different combinations.

All graphics are pre-made assets from fanatical. Same for sound effects except for the carrot sound which is taken from: https://freesound.org/people/basarunder/sounds/515316/  (Creative Commons)

Music by ALYCAT.
